meanings.definition: A unit of pressure equal to 1/760 of an atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The barometer showed the pressure in torr.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use torr to measure atmospheric pressure.
meanings.sent3: The torr unit decided the fate of the weather prediction game.
meanings.sent4: In the world of pressure, torr stands as a tiny giant.
meanings.sent5: The torr measurement made the air pressure crystal clear.

meanings.definition: To apply a unit of pressure measurement to a gas.
meanings.sent1: He will torr the gas to check its pressure.
meanings.sent2: Remember to torr the gas before conducting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The scientist decided to torr the gas for fun.
meanings.sent4: She torred the gas with precision, like a skilled chemist.
meanings.sent5: Torr carefully to ensure accurate pressure readings.
